name: Fatum Metamorphosis: VO1D D1V3R5
description:
Mech pilots!  Time Travel!  Rivals!

In the year 21XX, humanity has all but destroyed itself.  Our only hope is  to travel back into the past and change the present.  Join the Void Divers, the brave team that ventures through the perilous space between time to save humanity's future!

Fatum Metamorphosis: Void Divers was made for the  Summer Slow Jams 2020:  Turn-Based Games.  

Directions
+In Base+
Hover mouse near edge of screen to walk in that direction
Click on people/objects to interact
+In Maze+
Use on-screen arrows to navigate maze

Credits
Game by nanocodebug and cloverfirefly

Music from Bit by Bit Bert
Fonts Chevy Rae

Special thanks npckc
